about.title: About DriftAI
about.subtitle: Building AI strategies that work in the real world. We bridge the gap between cutting-edge AI capabilities and practical industry needs.
about.bio1: Andreas Buskop is a Senior Business Developer and Naval Architect with 16+ years of experience bridging technical complexity with commercial viability in the energy and maritime sectors. Currently completing an Executive Master in Management – Applied AI at BI Norwegian Business School, he combines deep domain expertise with emerging AI capabilities to solve real operational challenges.
about.bio2: The EDGE Framework and phased implementation approach I developed combines academic methodology with hands-on industry experience. This structured approach ensures AI initiatives deliver measurable value, not just technology for technology's sake.
about.bio3: I founded DriftAI because I saw a gap: companies drowning in AI hype but lacking practical roadmaps. Whether you're in maritime, energy, offshore, manufacturing, or engineering—the path to AI value follows similar patterns. My approach helps you find that path.

anonymized.insight: The question isn't whether AI creates value—the industry evidence is overwhelming. The question is how to implement it given organizational constraints.
